title: Jaara Nyilamum
creator_credit_for_label: 2021, Romaine Moreton (Goenpul Yagerabul Minjungbal Bundjalung), Lou Bennett AM (Dja Dja Warrung, Yorta Yorta). Filmed & Edited by Romaine Moreton, Co-Directed by Romaine Moreton & Lou Bennett AM
description: The making of Jaara Nyilamum (2021) evoked a stillness that restored us to full sensual immersion within country, and from this place of rooted calmness, country reaffirmed our Law is real. Jaara Nyilamum became most profound when we realised this was more than a film about ceremony, but was in fact, ceremony itself. Our challenge was to create a production model that aligned with our beliefs and centralised our Law, pushed back against monochronic time and engaged with the deep cycles of place, where we embraced Belonging as a process of constant renewal and Rematration.
